name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-dynamic-poll
title: React Dynamic Poll
shortDescription: This web part allows users to vote on an active poll and immediately see the results. It is built using the SharePoint Framework (SPFx), React, and Fluent UI. The web part fetches the active poll question and options from a SharePoint list named 'Polls' and stores user answers in a 'Poll Answers' list.
longDescription: This web part allows users to vote on an active poll and immediately see the results. It is built using the SharePoint Framework (SPFx), React, and Fluent UI. The web part fetches the active poll question and options from a SharePoint list named 'Polls' and stores user answers in a 'Poll Answers' list.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
